content: On a total basis, operating expenses in the third quarter were $10.4 million, 3.3% higher than the comparable period last year, but they would have been slightly lower without Astro Machine. Non-GAAP operating income in the quarter grew to $2.1 million or 5.2% of revenue from $300,000 or 1% of revenue in the same period last fiscal year. In the segments, Product ID operating profit was up 63% in the third quarter to nearly $3 million, which translated to an operating margin of 9.9%, up 160 basis points year-over-year.
